name: 72 Hours With Olivia (demo, visual novel)
description:
Watch as Olivia Johnson, the heartless girl as she slowly falls in love with an average boy Kael.
She forbids herself because she refuses to feel emotions, presuming that they're "pointless", according to her grandfather's old logic.
Kael has a history with Olivia that slowly unravels as you go forward into the story.
He's the only one that can change Olivia, so follow the story as Kael does so.

There are 2 endings in the game; Bad Ending, and Neutral Ending.

Demo time: 5 minutes

Full Game Time: 1 hour
